name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check Meta Robots - Stream for US IPTV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool Stream for US IPTV lets you know the online streaming application and check meta robots of any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In addition, the tool also helps you to check the meta-robots tag of any website.
With specific discriminant mode.
#noindex, none: red
#index,all: green

It is made by the "Streaming for US IPTV" to help the community quickly increase the performance and optimize their website.

This is a free app from https://toplistiptv.com/stream-for-us-iptv/
This app brings and updates most promptly for you.
